title: Share me about things that annoys you or pisses you off in game
body:
The things I find by far the most annoying and that pisses me off is the enemy team laughing off the mistakes/fails and even small mistakes I do, in all chat saying "lol" "LOL" "lmfao" and etc, and saying gg ez in all chat thinking they are all too good for the game and bragging about themselves.

And I for one don't laugh at such simple mistakes nor do I find them funny the people do, unless it was a beyond skilled outplay . Nor do I say gg ez once
